com.soa.auz

Interface IAuthorizationAuthority


  • public interface IAuthorizationAuthority
    This is the client interface for authorization.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAuthorizationToken authorize(javax.security.auth.Subject user, javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler callbackHandler, IResource resouce, java.lang.String action)
      Authorize whether a user has permission to performer action on a resource.

    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        IAuthorizationToken authorize(javax.security.auth.Subject user,
                              javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler callbackHandler,
                              IResource resouce,
                              java.lang.String action)
                       throws AuthorizationException
        Authorize whether a user has permission to performer action on a resource.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be authorized
        callbackHandler - The hander that can be used to provide additional credentail for subject
        resouce - The resource to be accessed, can be null
        Action - The action to be performed
        Returns:
        True if authorization succeeds, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException
